title.narrative: Technical Assistance for the project "Delivering climate resilient water and sanitation in Ethiopia" project.

description.narrative: Montrose has been contracted to provide technical assistance to the Government of Ethiopia as part of a progamme to improve the resilience of water and sanitation services to climate change in selected climate-vulnerable regions of the country.

recipient-country.narrative: Programme activities will be in the following areas: 1. Integrating climate resilience into WASH programme approaches and building the capacity of Government of Ethiopia staff to use climate information. 2. Implementing measures such as flood protection and drought management in selected districts (‘woredas’) in Ethiopia.

sector.narrative: The project aims to integrate climate resilience into WASH approaches and building capacity of Government of Ethiopia staff. This will include knowledge management and learning, and technical assistance to appraise and identify effective measures to promote climate resilience of WASH services such as flood protection and drought management in selected districts (‘woredas’).
